lexUnit.name: predict.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: state that (a specified event) will happen in the future.

sentence.text: Barclays director of UK Retail Services Seymour Fortescue predicts that history will mark the late 1980s as the watershed of personal banking .
In the eve-of-election euphoria , party aides had been confidently predicting that the Liberal Democrats could achieve a total of 29 or 30 seats .
